name: Burglar's Pack
description: A specialized kit for stealthy operations containing tools and supplies for infiltration and burglary. Unpacking equips a backpack and places all contents inside it.
notes: Contains: Backpack, Ball Bearings (1000), Rope (50 feet), Bell, Candle (5), Crowbar, Hammer, Piton (10), Hooded Lantern, Oil (5 flasks), Rations (5 days), Tinderbox, Waterskin, Traveler's Clothes
Must not be wearing a backpack to unpack
Unpacking equips backpack and places contents inside
Single use item - consumed when unpacked
